about_the_game:
Additional custom pack item for "Goonya Monster".

Purchasing this item adds the following DX Pack exclusive items.

- Goonyan Shooter (weapon for Buster)
- Golden Dragon (Monster)
- Silver King (costume head)
- Silver King (costume body)
- Goonyan stadium jumper (T-shirt)
- DX Long Sleeve (T-shirt)
- DELUXE! (message for Buster)
- (Deluxe?) (message for Monster)
- Gold Rush (profile plate)
- DX (title)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
